response.overview: A desperate teenage dropout takes an overnight security job at the long-abandoned Rebecca’s Chinese, once famous for its animatronic performers — Rebecca, Brandy Nitti, Lily Tino, and Erika Kirk — only to discover they still power on after midnight. Trapped inside with locked exits and flickering cameras, she’s hunted through the darkened dining halls and kitchens by the malfunctioning mascots who move with eerie awareness. By sunrise, she realizes the restaurant isn’t just haunted — it’s looking for a new headliner, and she’s the only one left to take the stage.
response.tagline: Welcome to The Pink Rainbow Chinese Takeaway Rebecca's!
response.title: Welcome to Rebecca's
